name: Out of Moves, Out of Spite
name_original: Out of Moves, Out of Spite
description:
Imagine yourself to be a regular hero in a standard sokoban-like puzzle game — but oh no! You have run out of moves and the greedy developers demand you to watch ads to continue moving. Will you bend under their command or will you persevere and complete the game without moving?

Made for Monthly Jam 3 with the theme Out of Moves

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
SHIFT to crouch
F to hit
G to use grappling hook
ESC to pause
LMB to interact with menus
